sentences.sContent: Her thick black hair cascaded down below her waist.
sentences.sCn: 她那浓密的黑发瀑布般垂过腰际。

sentences.sContent: Gallons of water cascaded over the side of the bath.
sentences.sCn: 大量的水从浴缸边溢出来。

trans.tranOther: a small steep  waterfall  that is one of several together

trans.tranCn: 像瀑布般大量倾泻下来
trans.tranOther: to flow, fall, or hang down in large quantities
